Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.gui

Class GameWindow

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.gui.GameWindow
public class GameWindow extends Object
This class creates the game window and all subcomponents including input capture.
